headline: Writing a Great Junior Tech Résumé
description:
A few weeks back I wrote this tweet:
I did a presentation / speaking thing last week that got me thinking: would it be useful to blog about how to build a resume as someone new to tech, from the perspective of a hiring manager? I might whip that up today or tomorrow if people like the idea.
&mdash; David Haney (@haneytron) July 9, 2018  43 likes later, it&rsquo;s clear to me that this topic is in-demand.
headline_zh-Hans: 撰写一份优秀的初级技术员履历表
headline_zh-Hant: 撰寫一份優秀的初級技術員履歷表
description_zh-Hans:
几周前我写了这条微博。
上周我做了一个演讲，这让我想到：从招聘经理的角度出发，写一篇关于如何建立一份技术新手的简历的博客是否有用？如果大家喜欢这个想法，我可能会在今天或明天把它写出来。
&mdash; David Haney (@haneytron) July 9, 2018 43 likes later, it&rsquo;s clear to me that this topic is in demand.
description_zh-Hant:
幾周前我寫了這條微博。
上週我做了一個演講，這讓我想到：從招聘經理的角度出發，寫一篇關於如何建立一份技術新手的簡歷的博客是否有用？如果大家喜歡這個想法，我可能會在今天或明天把它寫出來。
&mdash; David Haney (@haneytron) July 9, 2018 43 likes later, it&rsquo;s clear to me that this topic is in demand.
